junit@yahoogroups.com wrote:
> Yes, but at the cost of adding another class - another layer
> - for something
> that might be too small to warrent it.

If it's complex enough to need explicite testing, it's hardly too small to
warrant its own class to me. But then I like lots of small classes.

How small is "too small" to you?

Curious, Ilja
